instructions: 目的地就在前方的 Tripo AI。

companies.name: Tripo AI
companies.description: Tripo AI is a 3D generative AI platform that enables users to create high-quality 3D models from text or image prompts within seconds. Leveraging advanced AI algorithms, Tripo AI streamlines the process of generating detailed, textured 3D assets for applications in gaming, VR/AR, product design, and animation. The platform supports rapid prototyping, real-time rendering, and seamless integration with popular 3D software.
companies.categories: 3D Graphics, 3D Modeling, Artifical Intelligence (AI), Plug-ins for Software, Rendering & Modeling
